title: For sale- T206 Ty Cobb PSA 2 red background

posts.post_title: For sale- T206 Ty Cobb PSA 2 red background
posts.post_content:
sent to ebay

I am attempting to raise funds for a large purchase so I have my T206 Cobb Red Background Sweet Caporal up for sale.  Card is Off-centered top to bottom, has a few small creases by the corners and a little dirt on the back.  Price- $ delivered.
Lowered to $650-final price reduction on this one.
Bump- keeping this card available for a few more days before I have to deal with the bay- $600.
